Skill-Building Workshop: The Art of Negotiation
description: A deep dive into psychological frameworks and practical role-playing exercises for high-stakes business environments. Participants will learn how to identify non-verbal cues and leverage silence to gain an advantage in complex deal-making.

description: Understanding the moral implications of automated decision-making in the 21st century. This session explores the balance between algorithmic efficiency and the human responsibility to prevent data bias.

title: Leadership Masterclass: Scaling Teams
description: Transitioning from a technical specialist to a people leader. We will analyze real-world case studies of management failures and successes to help you build a resilient team culture.
